name: Accessibility design - PIN code screens
description:
Wireframe mock up for Interaction Design Foundation course on Accessibility.

a layout for a new landing page (the page will promote a new PIN code that can be used for a card). The task is for the user to learn about the PIN code and then set their PIN code (sends instructions to phone) and then go back to the web page.
